school_name: Emily Carr University of Art and Design
comments: hm.. not sure about him as a lecturer... BUT, he is a great guy in person. I believe that if he was in a smaller class he\'ll teach 10X better. The Content of the course is interesting. I like the class cause it was easy going =P no stress.

comments: HIS CLASS IS SOOOOO BORING!!! DO NOT TAKE UNLESS U HAVE TO.

school_name: Emily Carr University of Art and Design
Emily Carr University of Art and Design
comments: I have him for Design Culture. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS IF YOU DON\'T HAVE TO. There is nothing engaging about it. It\'s not that the subject matter isn\'t interesting, cause it is - Chan just manages to make everything excruciatingly boring.
